snippet: The state proposed to allow corrections officials to choose one of four types of barbiturates for executions depending on availability.
abstract: California proposes allowing corrections officials to choose one of four types of barbiturates to be used in executions, depending on which is available, in face of nationwide shortage of execution drugs; single-drug regimen would replace three-drug execution mix.
lead_paragraph: The state proposed to allow corrections officials to choose one of four types of barbiturates for executions depending on availability.

headline.main: California: Plan Proposed for Single-Drug Executions
headline.print_headline: California: Plan Proposed for Single-Drug Executions
